title: Digital Marketing Specialist

sections.full_text:
Digital Marketing Specialist
WaveConnect Montreal, QC

Responsibilities:
- Manage SEO and content marketing strategy
- Run Meta and Google Ads campaigns
- Conduct keyword research and competitor analysis
- Prepare performance reports for stakeholders
sections.skills:
- SEO, SEM
- Google Analytics, Google Ads
- Copywriting and content strategy

Preferred:
